attributes.action: lower the national driveing age to 16 and bring in driveing lessons at school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the national driveing age at the moment is 17 and 21 for a full licence i think that the national driveing age should be lowerd to 16 and for a full licence 20 and like the americans do we shoul bring in Driversed (a lesson at school teaching the top year (11/5th year) how to drive) this will then reduce the nomber of crashes because of the younger students learning to drive properly it will also stop people driveing with out a licence if you make this compulsery.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
